issue.title: [Java] Provide benchmarks to set IntVector with different methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
 

We provide benchmarks to evaluate the performance of setting IntVector in 3 different ways:
1. through a value holder
1. through a writer
1. directly set the value through a set method

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6172?focusedCommentId=16907846) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
